title: Gaggle, Herd, and Pod
description: Readers may have heard about a pack of wolves or a litter of puppies, but do they know which animals make up a gaggle or a pod? In Gaggle, Herd, and Pod, readers learn the meaning of these terms and more. Engaging photographs support the text.
highFrequencyWords: all, are, have, of, they, this
reviewWords: bats, colony, crows, gaggle, gather, geese, groups, herd, jellyfish, murder, pack, pod, smack, together, whales, wolves, zebras
grammar: Nouns                : Use and identify collective nouns
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Understand and use content vocabulary
